entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Net6 - RC1] JsonSerializerContext Breaking Change? #20999
  • MSBuild error for dotnet build with --self-contained #20992

Closed

  • [6.0 RC1] F5 debugging ASP.NET Core broken in Visual Studio due to HTTP 404 #20444
  • `dotnet watch test` doesn't pass through args to the `dotnet test` #20974

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #20998
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #20997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #20996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #20995
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Allow specifying url for workload rollback #20991
    Area-Workloads
  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20990
    Area-Compatibility
  • [Backport] [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish (#20961) #20988
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Warn when using .NET 6 with 16.11 #20987
    Area-NetSDK
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController dependency #20984
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20979
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20972
    Area-Compatibility
  • [Blazor] Improves dotnet.js detection on ComputeBlazorPublishAssets #20980
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Hide unused workload verbosity options #20983
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Revert rc1 branch back to rc1 tooling versions #20986
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish #20961
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build reference #20971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20959
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink
  • remove unused env var: `DOTNET_SKIP_FIRST_TIME_EXPERIENCE` #20955
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
